description: The Hydrus 3.0 Whirlpool bib is a versatile choice for paddlers on a budget. Paired with one of our dry tops, the system will keep you comfortably dry all day. Other features include a zippered top loading chest pocket, adjustable suspenders and self draining seat and knee reinforcement patches.
name: Kokatat Hydrus 3.0 Whirlpool Bibs w/ R/Z & Socks - Mens
